page.title: 10VICTORIA SCHOOL, PENARTH
page.content: Our school was built in 1897, it is a two storey, red brick building with a slate roof.It is situated on a busy road leading to the town centre.Behind the school is quite a large,triangular shaped playground with some large oak and sycamore trees at the infant end. The school has 285 pupils in ten classes, four infant and six junior. Facilities include{a library,a school {bookshop, a pottery room,two BBC micro {computers, a video, two televisions {and a playing field about 200m. away. { }We have the opportunity of playing many different sports, including {netball,rugby,soccer,cricket,baseball, {shinty and lacrosse,}and musical instruments including{guitar, violin, {recorder and cornet.}Our school pets are gerbils, mice, a guinea pig called Malibu and an aquarium containing tropical fish.
